snippet: Blake Griffin returned to Los Angeles for an evaluation of a left knee injury, opening the door for Anthony Davis to join the United States Olympic basketball team.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Clippers forward Blake Griffin injures his left knee during practice for the 2012 Olympics, opening the door for New Orleans Hornets forward Anthony Davis to join the United States Olympic basketball team; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Blake Griffin returned to Los Angeles for an evaluation of a left knee injury, opening the door for Anthony Davis to join the United States Olympic basketball team.

headline.seo: Griffin Injury Clears Way on Olympic Team for Anthony Davis
headline.main: Griffin Injury Clears Way on U.S. Team for Top Pick
headline.print_headline: Griffin Injury Clears Way on U.S. Team for Top Pick
